p: LiOH (4 equiv) was added to a solution of the ester (1 equiv) in THF/MeOH/H 2O (3:1:1, 1 ml/mmol) and the reaction mixture was heated in a microwave reactor set with the following parameters: 100 °C, 10 min, 300 W, 250 psi. After concentration of the mixture, 2 N HCl aqueous solution (10 ml) was added and the resulting slurry was extracted with ethyl acetate (3 × 20 ml). The collected organic phases were washed with brine, dried over anhydrous Na 2SO 4, filtered and concentrated under reduced pressure to give a crude material that is purified by flash column chromatography. Yields, purification methods and other analytical data are reported below.
